_field_string_id.name: Inside reverb name#This reverb will be used for inside areas when the listener is outside.

_field_real.name: attenuation adjustment factor#1 is no change, 0.5 is half, etc
enemy rtpc distance#max distance an enemy can be to be counted in our enemy-related rtpcs
kill count frequency time period:seconds#the amount of time to consider a kill relevant for the kill count frequency
combat intensity RTPCs timer#number of seconds between each time the combat intensity RTPCs are set

_field_block_64.name: State Groups#State groups we care enough about to have saved and loaded, as well as inherited during campaign player-teleportation
